S08n728:7: atha bhagavān sarvatathāgataguhyavajraṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpadyedaṃ [sarvatathāgataguhyamabhāṣat |
S08n728:8: yathā yathā hi vinayāḥ sarvasatvāḥ] svabhāvataḥ |

S08n728:21: sarvakarmāṇi kurvan vaṃ sa bahupuṇyamāpnute || iti ||
